rightToReside.legend: Do you have the right to live or work in the UK without any immigration restrictions?
rightToReside.hint: You have this right if you have a British passport or are a British citizen or British subject with right of abode.
rightToReside.required: Select yes if you have the right to live or work in the UK without any immigration restrictions.

lived2Years.legend: Have you lived permanently in the UK for the last 2 years?
lived2Years.required: Select yes if you have lived permanently in the UK for the last 2 years.
